Title: Office 2007 Zoom Track Bar
Description: ZoomBar2007 is a control that imitates Office 2007 lower right side zoom track bar. It has two versions: regular control and ToolStripItem that can be used in the status bar.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ZoomBar2007 is a control that imitates Office 2007 lower right side zoom track bar. It has two versions: regular control and ToolStripItem that can be used in the status bar.
